body:
Hello Avicus Network
I am here today creating this thread to announce that my podcast the shadowCast will be live! For its first episode! But what I require of you people of the Avicus Network is what should talk about it might be a AMA or a Game or none of those we just talk about stuff

So please suggest topics before the timer runs out! (http://itsalmo.st/#finishedtosubmityourshadowcasttopics)

Reguards
shadowolf365
Babe Of Avicus
